choices: Giant sized among either normal or tinies
A character from a different media
1.content:
You are a Loli character who is huge..

Whether that loli is either made big, born huge, giant sized among normal or tinies, or transported into another world surrounded by giantesses and is huge, and whether she or thegiantess(es) is maternal, loving, friendly, playful, cruel is up to you entirely.

So the loli in question is...
1.title: You are a loli

11.content:
So how is our lovely Loli grown?

Science Experiment: The loli is grown by an experimental growth procedure, willingly or unwillingly. The loli might have even accidentally destroyed the experiment that leaves her huge, and well you can imagine where the goes from her.

Exposure to Virus, Sickness, or Chemical: The Loli is made big by an unknown agent. Whether a virus, sickness, or chemical, the exposure leaves her and possibly other girls her huge, she will have to use her newfound size to get help or get by.

Physical Genetic Disorder: She has a disorder that grows her body just as she ages up, and that goes for her body and appearances. She might as well be as big as a house at age 6.

Early puberty: She grows when she gets aroused by means, and it’s another disorder. At least a few inches or feet, and perhaps she tries to get herself really aroused.
11.title: Grown

111.content:
Here are some options for lolis growing via science experiments:

Name: Kari
Age: 8
Height: 300 feet
Appearance: https://th.bing.com/th/id/OIP.0cNM-2AKqR...
Bio: An ordinary Japanese school girl who grew into a giantess as a result of her father's serum that was meant to regrow severed limbs. She's mostly a gentle giantess, but she can be a bit dangerous when she's playful.

Name: Sarah
Age: 10
Height: 400 feet
Appearance:https://image.dhgate.com/0x0/f2/albu/g1/M01/45/05/rBVaGVbtrOCAXIf RAAERUv0pQOI545.jpg
Bio: Sarah was grown to kaiju size by an experiment of a mysterious organization that sought to have young girls rule the world. She loves rampaging through cities and makes boys and adults do what she wants or else.

Name: Rosy
Age: 6
Height: 250 feet
Appearance:https://n.nordstrommedia.com/ImageGallery/store/product/Zoom/18/_ 5331038.jpg?crop=pad&pad_color=FFF&format=jpeg&w=704&h=1080
Bio: Rosy was born sickly to the point the doctors didn't think she'd live finish grade school. When she volunteered as the subject of a top secret government experiment, it not only cured her, it made her the biggest, strongest and healthiest girl in the world! She loves rampaging and destroying, but she has the power to fix everything once she's done.

Name: Maiko
Age: 9
Height: 500 feet
Appearance:http://fc01.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2013/188/3/5/redhair_girl_by_lu ckyshiney-d6ce328.png
Bio: A young girl with a beautiful voice who was subjected to an experiment by a shady corporation to make her the greatest J-pop idol ever. Now she's as tall as a skyscraper and can enthrall entire cities with her otherworldly singing.
111.title: Science experiment

115.content:
Okay, here are a few more options.

Aliens: Aliens kidnap her and modify her and then she is sent back down to Earth not the same, at least height wise.

Magic: The Loli was practicing some magic to and ends up casting a spell that ends up making her big.
115.title: More options

choices: Intentionally creating a super sized Loli
Teleporter with size magnifying mode? Why is that a thing?
Alien vitamins do the body good... too good
Something else from or caused by aliens
1151.content:
Ok so this seems reasonably
Self explanatory but we can assume
there’s a few options here


1 - Is kinda revisiting the earlier option
But what if the girl in question is enlarged
via Alien Experiment unintentionally?


2 - What if aliens intentionally modify
the young girls size for whatever reason?


3 thru 5 are basically variations on
What if the Aliens accidentally or even unknowingly
did something that led to the girls size being
altered on the larger side?
1151.title: Aliens

1153.content:
Here are even more options for our lovely Loli to grow.

Transformed into a kaiju: The Loli was experimented by the government or someone, and was made to become a kaiju. She would be made huge and trained to become a giant monster from birth. Though being a giant Loli would also mean being cute as well, etc.

A Goddess: One day she is meant by a being and is told that she’s a goddess and can do whatever she want. Being a full on goddess, she is bound to grow big.
1153.title: More options

12.content: The Loli is born huge and is raised by her biological or adoptive parents, maybe an orphanage. Don’t know how normal parents would have huge lolis, maybe a story reason could be explained by selections?
12.title: Born huge

13.content:
A huge loli lives with either normal sized or huge families, so they all tower the people before them.

What scenarios are we talking about?

A Giant Family: She lives with a giant female family where they tower over tinies, just as basic as it gets when you think about it, but we can find a way to make it interesting.

The Giantess in the Woods: A lonely family comes across a giantess in the woods, and the family befriends her. She is big and she hides away from the rest of the world due to them being afraid of her.

Queens of the World: A giantess rules over Earth as it’s queen, either as a dictator or a benevolent ruler. The focus loli happens to be related to the giantess, and she is huge too. She is learning from her on how to rule over the world.

The circus: She is the star attraction of a circus which houses many acts, but the giant loli is the main star for her huge height and her beautiful appearance, maybe she has a family there.

More options
13.title: Giant sized among either normal or tinies

135.content:
Okay, lets use a few more options.

Monster Island: The Young Loli is actually a kaiju (human, anthro, etc) And is sent to live on this specially made island made for them by the government, surely the huge Loli is gonna either be trapped or have lots of fun being huge with friends as the new arrival.

Dystopia: The world as we knew it was no more. Cities have collapsed, society collapses, humans are few and far between, all because of maybe some huge lolis, I don’t know who are all cruel.
135.title: More Options

1353.content:
Why not some tiny related options here.

Shipwrecked: A Loli or a few lolis was out in the sea with their family when they get shipwrecked and end up stuck in a remote island. Soon they realize that they are giants among tinies that live there. Maybe an island of small Shotas? Lol.

Shrink Ray: The girl invents a shrink ray and starts shrinking people to become a Giantess. Why didn’t I put this option first.
1353.title: More options

choices: Wait it’s supposed to shrink NOT GROW
13533.content:
Shrink Ray v2: I like the idea but I’m a fan of
accidents or things going wrong so what if -
The girl or someone she knows invents
what was intended to be a shrink ray but
due to a mistake or error in building it
instead of SHRINK ONLY it only enlarges

Resulting in the Loli girl getting an unexpected
size boost maybe even a continuous boost
13533.title: More Options

14.content:
Okay, so the huge loli is being transported to a new world, why not we get mentioning on options.

Fantasy World: Where dragons, giants, orcs, and many other creatures rule, and it is medieval times where this is all set. The loli is a giant is has to learn to survive in this new and harsh world.

Sci-Fi: The loli could be normal or huge size, but she lives in the future where we are no longer limited in space travel, advancements in technology, and also see aliens as well.

Different Era in Time: She travels in time where she ends up as a giant and ends up altering the course of history. Maybe ancient Japan, or ancient Egypt, I don’t judge where you come from on the history of it all.

Alternative world: She ends up in a different world which is different from her own, where her counterpart is not born, but many people remain the same, but she ends up huge in that world by some crazy means. Perhaps its a new world where women rule over men or something?
14.title: Transported to a new world

choices: Stick with this and choose your Loli
145.content:
Ok so I had this kinda crazy
semi new idea for

Alice in wonderland meets aliens meets
Sci-Fi meets magic which I might slip into
other interactives of mine too.


——

It’s modern-ish day.
All is normal for a girl who need not be
named or dressed like Alice

That is until she’s abducted and dragged into
an unexpected rabbits hole!

She is brought to a planet nearly identical
To Earth.
She never sees her captives but they speak to
her.


“Young girl you have been transported from
your home world to what we’ve dubbed
Earth-Athalon a replica of your earth nearly
identical except a few major and minor things!


You have been chosen for
“Project Choice Wonderland”
A long term experiment by several alien
races and tribunals joined together!

On this Earth you’ll find everything you need
to survive either in the wilds or civilization
however you are the ONLY Earthling!

Most things are as they are on your
Earth however this Earth is 20x larger
than your Earth and while there’s water
you’ll find no sea or oceans.

There are rivers, lakes, hot springs and
cold springs, and ponds.
You’ll also notice a lack of certain animal
species.

As part of this project you’ll notice that you
age at 1/3000th your normal rate even though
time passes as on your Earth.

Furthermore it is based in part on some of
what your culture calls wonderland media.

While some water is normal please note
the signs that will be posted near certain
plants or water sources,

There are several hot springs, cold springs,
lakes, and even plants with signs near them
labeled 1 of 3 things
“Grow”
“Shrink”
“Normalizer”

And yes as they suggest eating or drinking
them will produce the effect listed.
You can at your leisure shrink or grow in
size however as you are in captivity here
you’ll find that even if you tried outgrowing
planets there’s a limit and an impenetrable
barrier!


If you try to escape or outgrow it the
barrier WILL ZAP and shrink you in a
painful process unlike that of the
magic water or plants.

Also please note that aside from the barrier
if you’re enlarged to more than
10x your normal size or shrunken to any smaller
than doll sized or roughy 10 inches you’ll
gain invulnerability to everything except the
barrier.


Also please note that in addition to housing
for your normal size you’ll find scaled up
housing for you while giant sized should you
want or need it however you will not
find real housing for you in your shrunken
state unless of course you locate a dollhouse.


You’ll also find that nothing on this faux
Earth is poisonous!
We wish you luck as we observe you
on this unique experiment!
Also you’ll find a few things more high
tech than you might be accustomed to
such as Robots, Androids, several smart
devices and also Q & A booths with signs
should you need to talk to us again!


With that the experiment and your
captivity monitoring has begun”
145.title: More Options

154.content:
There have been sightings of giant girls in classic literature before. Which of these books featuring giants or tiny people are we talking about here?

Tom Thumb

Gulliver’s Travels

Jack and the Beanstalk

-or-

The Borrowers (or the Littles)
154.title: Literature Books

1542.content:
In Gulliver’s Travels, there are two nations hidden in the world where the citizens are of different sizes: Lilliput, the home of the tiny Lilliputians, and Brobdingnag, home of the giant Brobdingnagian people.

In the following scenarios, choose who you want to be.

Lilliputian - You are a tiny citizen of Lilliput who set off into the wide open world when your boat was carried off by a storm and into the land of giants where you are found by a young girl who is bigger than you. You are either in the human world or in Brobdingnag.

Human - You are a human girl, a young survivor of a ship that was capsized during a storm at sea. You end up washing on the shores of Lilliput where the tiny citizens tie you down to the sand but you are big and strong enough to break free. How you treat them is up to you.

Or...

You are Gulliver’s himself, and you wash upon the shores of Brobdingnag when you are found by the young giantess Glumdalclitch.

Brobdingnagian- You are a young Brobdingnagian girl, either the young nurse Glumdalclitch or someone else her age. You sail off into the open world and you come across a tiny nation of people, either humans or Lilliputians.
1542.title: Gulliver’s Travels

info.brief_description: A spin-off of Small Shotas Redux, featuring huge lolis. Come add to it if you like SSR..
info.description:
Disclaimer here. This story is only mention to be for entertainment and to only be treated as such, so don’t take anything here too seriously. I have had people come and tell me that on this type of stuff, so I do encourage y’all not to be those types of people. Yes they are kids in this story, but don’t think that this is a pedophile story. I am only making this interactive for entertainment, nothing else.

Here is a link to the original story by ejones312, and this spin-off is made with his approval.

Small Shotas Redux: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2215903-Small-Shotas-Redu...

You are a huge Loli, either grown or have meant tinies, in any world’s of media or original, as a media character or a original one. You are a huge Loli so you can decide how you treat the world around you, be nice or be cruel. Maybe playful.

Rules:
No giant males
No scat or piss content
No nudity, at least a swimsuit
No unbirth
No killing the main character
They can be more than one giant Loli character
The main character must be less than 15 years old.

Girlzilla: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2226717-Girlzilla-Giantes...

Life of a Giant Kid/Kidzilla: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2226082-Life-of-a-Giant-K...

Tiny Prison: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2225005-The-Tiny-Prison-a...

Goddess Ruler: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2224922-Goddess-Ruler-A-G...

The Daibijin Interactive: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2219621-The-Daibijin-Inte...

Child/Preteen Giantess: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2219542-ChildPreteen-Gian...

Chantal: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/1881854-Chantal-The-Drago...

A Typical Life of a Kaiju Giantess: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/1845671-ATypical-Life-as-...
